text: Paradise is a 1991 drama movie. It is about a young couple torn apart by family tragedy. Don Johnson plays Ben Reed. Melanie Griffith plays Lily Reed. Elijah Wood plays Willard. Thora Birch plays Billie. This movie was released on October 4, 1991. Category:American drama movies Category:1991 movies Category:1990s drama movies
title: Paradise (movie)
